ca.utoronto.msrg.padres.common.comm
Class CommSystem 

java.lang.Object
  ca.utoronto.msrg.padres.common.comm.CommSystem

public class CommSystem
				
extends Object

Author:
Bala Maniymaran Created: 2010-08-11 The class to provide the communication layer for the PADRES components. This object is not protocol-specific, but the objects it creates are. Only this object and the MessageSender objects are exposed to the upper layer. Messages from communication layer to the upper layer are conveyed via MessageListenerInterface. CommSystem objects created by Brokers can instantiate servers to accept connections and messages.

Constructor Detail

CommSystem

public CommSystem()
           throws CommunicationException
Initiates the data structures. Finds all the local IPv4 address.

Throws:
CommunicationException - When there is an error in finding the IPv4 addresses

isEqualServerURI

public boolean isEqualServerURI(String remoteURI)
                         throws CommunicationException
Checks whether a given server URI is the same as the default server's

Parameters:
remoteURI - A server URI to be checked with
Returns:
true if the URIs are the same, false otherwise
Throws:
CommunicationException - Either default server is not initiated or given URI is malformatted or of unrecognized communication protocol.

createListener

public void createListener(String serverURI)
                    throws CommunicationException
To create a server that listens for connections and messages from other entities.

Parameters:
serverID - A unique identifier for the server. It must be unique in the whole system, but the uniqueness is not verified by the system.
serverURI - URI of the server. It should specify the communication protocol type, IP address, and port number
Throws:
CommunicationException - it is thrown when
  • A server with the same ID already exists in the exisiting list of servers
  • The communication protocol is not recognized
  • There is a problem in created the specific type of communication server
See Also:
CommSystem.CommSystemType

addMessageListener

public void addMessageListener(String serverURI,
                               MessageListenerInterface msgListener)
                        throws CommunicationException
Add a message listener to a specific server. All the messages received by the server is passed on to this message listener.

Parameters:
serverURI - The URI of the server to which the message listener to be added
msgListener - The message listener to be added
Throws:
CommunicationException - if supplied serverURI is malformated.

addMessageListener

public void addMessageListener(MessageListenerInterface msgListener)
Similar to addMessageListener(String, MessageListenerInterface), but adds the message listener to all the servers.

Parameters:
msgListener - The message listener to be added.

addConnectionListener

public void addConnectionListener(String serverURI,
                                  ConnectionListenerInterface connectListener)
                           throws CommunicationException
Adds a connections listener to a specific server. When the server receives a connection request from a client, the given connection listener is informed.

Parameters:
serverURI - The URI of the server to which the listener is to be added.
connectListener - The connection listener to be added.
Throws:
CommunicationException - If given serverURI is malformatted

addConnectionListener

public void addConnectionListener(ConnectionListenerInterface connectListener)
Similar to addConnectionListener(String, ConnectionListenerInterface), but adds the connection listener to all the servers.

Parameters:
connectListener - The connection listener to be added.

getMessageSender

public MessageSender getMessageSender(String remoteServerURI)
                               throws CommunicationException
Returns a message sender, with which the upper level components can send messages to a remote entity. The communication type of the message sender returned by this method varies depends on the URI of the remote entity to which the connection to be made.

Parameters:
remoteServerURI - The URI of the remote entity's server.
Returns:
An object that is the child class of MessageSender. The actual type depends on remoteServerURI
Throws:
CommunicationException - Either there is an error in given URI or an error occurred while creating the MessageSender
See Also:
CommSystem.CommSystemType

isIPAddress

public static boolean isIPAddress(String addr)
Check whether a given string has the format of an IP address

Parameters:
addr - The string to be checked
Returns:
true if the string is an IP address; false otherwise

isLocalAddress

public static boolean isLocalAddress(String hostname)
                              throws CommunicationException
Checks whether a given hostname belongs to the local machine.

Parameters:
hostname - The hostname to check
Returns:
true if the given hostname refers to a loopback name ("localhost") or resolved to one of the local IP addresses; false otherwise
Throws:
CommunicationException - if the given hostname could not be resolved to an IP address

              throws CommunicationException
